app.name: ww-43db-patcher
app.long_description: Patches the WiiWare 4:3 aspect ratio database (43DB) within vWii's System Menu U8 archive to stub its entries, effectively enabling access to 16:9 aspect ratio in WiiWare titles where 4:3 is otherwise enforced. An option to only patch most demanded WiiConnect24-related channel entries (Everybody Votes Channel, Check Mii Out Channel) is also provided.
